website_summaries.verdict: Taken from the renowned Nike Air Max 270 sneaker, the round-toe running-inspired Nike Air Max Motion 2 offers more than a fashionable flair. It has been lauded by the majority of users for its comfort, lightness, and superb arch support that suits the day-long use. Many also praised its quality craftsmanship, consistent with the Nike label. With this pair's affordability, this is a nice alternative to the pricier AM 270.
pros: Most users like the stylish and versatile appeal of the Nike Air Max Motion 2
The majority of satisfied buyers have cited that they find this iteration very comfortable
Not many wearers share that they find the upper "breathable
Several reviewers have mentioned that this sneaker is made of high-quality materials
A handful of users applaud the superb arch support of the Nike AM Motion 2
This model is available in multiple colorways
The lightness of this kick was praised many times in the reviews
It is included in Nike's list of affordable sneakers
Few wearers with feet problems have shared that their foot pain disappears whenever they wear this model
The majority of users highly recommended this kick to their friends
cons: A few users complain that the colorways of AM Motion 2 of Nike presented on the internet is different from actual

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are already falling apart. After a short time the stitches that attach the tongue on the left shoe have started to come away. For this price and brand this is unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great style, not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Sole on right side of the right shoe seems off. Gets to be uncomfortable after walking around. I only get Nike and this is the only shoe that I’ve had a problem with. The shoe looks nice, just not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product/ terrible presentation
customer_reviews.text: Nike runs narrow and for that reason I wear a size larger than any other brand. The size I needed was not an option so I went small and they fit pretty well. The reason I gave 4 stars was the presentation. The box was DESTROYED...like closed with a rubberband destroyed. Also the paper stuffing in the shoes was missing.....overall the shoe is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes like always. No break in period. There was some glue stain on one of the shoes at the toe part between the mesh and where the rubber meets, but not enough to make the shoe look bad. I’d buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are not made for walking....
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these for several hours my feet were very sore. These shoes are not comfortable... look great but....
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy SlipPurrs

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: good price and pretty comfortable. Not to mention, nice looking !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful item
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed not even a month sole is coming off and it Squeaks very disappointing with the price I paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the price I got these for. Locally these Shoes were $30 more!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Brosher

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I like how they feel like a glove when I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: jose r quinones

customer_reviews.title: No comfort for the money!!! $20 max
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is probably the worst that I have had from Nike for comfort I would advise going to a store and trying on there running shoes before purchase. Absolutely NO comfort and the insoles are so thin you mite as well be barefoot. $20 shoe at best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Leidenfrost

customer_reviews.title: I should of return it. But I did get glue stain out
customer_reviews.text: It had some glue stain that took me alot of tries to get it OFF.. But i finally got it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Tran

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected and would order again
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved these! He has wider feet and they even stretched out to fit, which is rare. He wears them all the time. Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable for people that are on their feet most of the time
customer_reviews.text: They are not confotable at all. I bought this shoes because.of the brand. I thought they were supposed to be comfortable because I'm standing most of the time but they ended up no being comfortable :/ Also the price is paid for this shoes was outrageous 😤
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Apodaca

customer_reviews.title: Love y’all service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for my grandson, he just got his prosthetics. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable. Sole is too stiff. Hopefully they just need breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: These where meant as a gift but when I received the package the box was in a very bad condition so was embarrassed gifting shoes with a beat up box or shoes without a box and also it was 4 days late then my expected delivery date
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Fit and Feel great, just hope they are not knock-off's. lol
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift for my son. He appreciated it, says they're extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sonia santiago

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They are just like the pic and fits perfectly not too tight or loose Im a 9 in women got an 8 in men and its perfect👌🏾They feel pretty durable as well. I recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware !!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for about 12 hours and when I took them off the material on the soles completely ripped off... absolutely horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Russo

customer_reviews.title: Color wrong
customer_reviews.text: The color isn’t as expected. The red is almost a pink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit properly. I am having pain in my ankle while using this. When I tie the shoe laces they always slip. Not great at all.
customer_reviews.author: kasi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comfortable shoes. My husband loves them and they are Ohio State colors.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: For that price I was expecting something better, they feel like a cheap reebok pair. I better have bought some asics
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Review
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great, however, the box came in wet and so did the shoes. Aside from that they fit perfect, and luckily didn’t have a bad smell from the wet box.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable I’m on my feet 8-12 hours a day and I’m very happy with these sneakers
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great color.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try something new dig the color would be cool if it was purple for the Lakers colors. Great style.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Andrade

customer_reviews.title: great experience
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and ordering was great and very fast, will gladly purchase again in the future
customer_reviews.author: ralph smith

customer_reviews.title: Cool pair of shoes for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is extremely happy with the shoes! Looks great and very comfortable! Very recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Torosova

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of shoes! And super fast shipping! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these and said they are perfect and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Dress

customer_reviews.title: Fit-able and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design and the fit I disliked the whole nothing lol I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Munk

customer_reviews.title: Looks great feel should be better u set foot.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would have more support under my foot . More air action
customer_reviews.author: Michael Garcia

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE NOT RED AND GRAY THEY ARE PINK AND GRAY
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE NOT RED AND GRAY THEY ARE PINK AND GRAY
customer_reviews.author: kristi
